date: Sun Feb 20 2022 09:17:57 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: Grace Tame has taken to Twitter to express her disappointment at the media publication of an old photograph showing her with a bong. The rebuke comes in response to coverage of the 2014 photo, which was taken from a now-deleted post on her Instagram account. Ms Tame went on to say she had been consistently and "completely transparent about all the demons I\'ve battled in the aftermath of child sexual abuse, drug addiction, self-harm, anorexia and PTSD.
